attributes.description:
At Hatfield VW Rivonia we offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. 

Contact us to become part of the Hatfield Volkswagen family.‚Äù

attributes.description:
The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 2 year / 30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This new spec Suzuki Swift is now packed with ESP(Electronic Stability Program) assisting you in those hectic bends.

Book your test drive today!

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
